cmd='/usr/bin/cmake;-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release;-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fpermissive;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-fpermissive;-DCMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY=;-DCAPSTONE_ARCHITECTURE_DEFAULT=ON;-DCAPSTONE_BUILD_TESTS=OFF;-DCAPSTONE_BUILD_CSTOOL=OFF;-DCAPSTONE_INSTALL=OFF;-DCAPSTONE_BUILD_SHARED=OFF;-DCMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE=ON;-DCAPSTONE_ARCHITECTURE_DEFAULT=OFF;-DCAPSTONE_BUILD_STATIC_RUNTIME=OFF;-DCAPSTONE_ARM_SUPPORT=ON;-DCAPSTONE_ARM64_SUPPORT=ON;-DCAPSTONE_MIPS_SUPPORT=ON;-DCAPSTONE_X86_SUPPORT=ON;-DCAPSTONE_PPC_SUPPORT=ON;-DCAPSTONE_SPARC_SUPPORT=ON;-DCAPSTONE_SYSZ_SUPPORT=ON;-GUnix Makefiles;-S;<SOURCE_DIR><SOURCE_SUBDIR>;-B;<BINARY_DIR>'
